plot: An elderly physicist recalls the commissioning at the turn of the 21st century of the most complex machine ever built by man - a particle accelerator designed to unlock the secrets of the Universe.
title: Le chant des particules
plot_es: An elderly physicist recalls the commissioning at the turn of the 21st century of the most complex machine ever built by man - a particle accelerator designed to unlock the secrets of the Universe.
plot_en: An elderly physicist recalls the commissioning at the turn of the 21st century of the most complex machine ever built by man - a particle accelerator designed to unlock the secrets of the Universe.
